abstract: Elite Rodeo Athletes drops antitrust lawsuit against Pro Rodeo Cowboys Association, effectively splitting sport into rival bodies; PRCA views group, led by dozens of top rodeo stars, as illegitimate and says it will bar ERA athletes from earning points towards its sanctioned championships.

headline.main: With Lawsuit Dropped, a Divisive Rodeo Season Is Expected

snippet: Elite Rodeo Athletes, a fledgling rodeo circuit that plans to start a season tour in March, dropped an antitrust suit against the Pro Rodeo Cowboys Association.
lead_paragraph: Elite Rodeo Athletes, a fledgling rodeo circuit that plans to start a season tour in March, dropped an antitrust suit against the Pro Rodeo Cowboys Association.
